title: BUG [ GAMEPLAY ] Dying after victory/defeat screen by yorick ghouls
body:
I'm posting here as i can't post on the NA Bug boards in hoping someone may forward or review it here.
Minor bug but still matters especially since it affects KDA.

Basically I was killed while the defeat screen was showing by yorick ghouls while we're supposed to be invulnerable.

Haven't been able to reproduce because the conditions are pretty hard
i was playing anivia, went into zhonays before my nexus was destroyed, came out on the defeat screen and ghouls killed me.

to reproduce i'd say 
summon ghouls to target character before zhonyas
activate zhonays on said charater
end the game
ghouls will attack and deal damage during victory/defeat screen when they come out of zhonays

replies.body:
>activate zhonays on said charater
end the game

This is the same with any invulnerability spell and has been in the game for ages, and is simply to do with how invulnerability is coded (because there isn't a separate invulnerability for the end of the game, it's the same as the invulnerability from any spells.)
while that is true, everyone else stops attacking and losing the function too, however ghouls don't at the moment and yeah will just ruin you lol

Well then just don't Zhonya's and shit.

Plus it should only apply to ghouls that spawn AFTER the nexus destruction (unless rito fucked their coding royally) meaning it's virtually impossible to do.
